tool_description: Find "body fat percentage",  "ideal weight", "BMI", "daily calory requirement" and some macro nutrients with this api.
name: Fitness Calculator
title: Fitness Calculator

api_list.name: Daily calory requirements
api_list.description: Knowing your daily calorie requirements is important to achieve your final goal. You can calculate your daily calorie req. for 7 different goals.

api_list.name: Burned Calorie From Activity
api_list.description: Calculate the burned calorie for a specific activity.

api_list.name: activities
api_list.description: Find the met values for activities.

api_list.name: Food Info
api_list.description: Find the food info for a food id from the food database.

api_list.name: Food Names And Ids
api_list.description: Find food table ids for a sub-table in the food database.

api_list.name: Sub_Table Names
api_list.description: Find sub-table names of a table name in the food database.

api_list.name: tablenames
api_list.description: Find the more than 70 main table names of the food database.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fitness-calculator.p.rapidapi.com/foodids/tablenames"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fitness-calculator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://fitness-calculator.p.rapidapi.com/foodids/tablenames"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fitness-calculator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: macros amounts
api_list.description:
Find the amount of macro nutrients in four different categories which are balanced, low-fat, low-carbs and high-protein for a specific calorie burned. There are 6 inputs which are age, gender, height, weight, activity level and goal. 

For activity level :
    
-     "1" : "BMR",
-     "2" : "Sedentary: little or no exercise",
-     "3" : "Exercise 1-3 times/week",
-     "4" : "Exercise 4-5 times/week",
-     "5" : "Daily exercise or intense exercise 3-4 times/week",
-     "6" : "Intense exercise 6-7 times/week",
-     "7" : "Very intense exercise daily, or physical job" 

For goals : 

-      "maintain" : "maintain weight",
-     "mildlose" : "Mild weight loss",
-     "weightlose" : "Weight loss",
-     "extremelose" : "Extreme weight loss",
-     "mildgain" : "Mild weight gain",
-     "weightgain" : "Weight gain",
-     "extremegain" : "Extreme weight gain"

api_list.name: Body Fat Percentage
api_list.description: Knowing body fat percentage would be helpful to decide on a well-programmed fitness plan. You can use this endpoint with 7 parameters.

api_list.name: Ideal weight
api_list.description: Find four different ideal weight scores according to four different well-known equations which are Hamwi, Devine, Miller, Robinson.  There are two parameters which are age and height(cm) values.

api_list.name: bmi
api_list.description: Find body mass index value (BMI) with this endpoint. You just need to enter three parameters which are age, weight (kg), and height(cm) information.
